Posts.Content: Jul 13, 2016 11:15PM las3mujeres wrote: Cancer does not run in my family but my mom was diagnosed at age 80 almost 6 weeks ago - left breast (6/10/16). She had surgery 10 days later on 6/20/16 ... she chose to have a double mastectomy. Still waiting on results to decide if chemo will be warranted or not.
Posts.Title: Would you mind sharing your age at time of diagnosis? ByFaith Gussy
